text: Niyo mndima ywa kwembingu ywa kane avila gunda dyakwe. Fungu dimwenga mwe mafungu matatu yaligane ya zuwa yatoigwa, seivyo naho dya mnenge, na ntondo chani fungu dyawo dimwenga mwa matatu yaligane yakomele chiza. Fungu dimwenga mwe matatu yaligane dya msi diswesa ung'azi saivyo naho dye chilo.
